article.p: I am a undergraduate student major in bioinformatics. Although my works are mostly about bioinformatics, I love computer science more. My research interests are program transformation, human-computer interaction, data visualization and programming education.

A free/libre JavaScript library that helps displaying phylogenetic trees in HTML and SVG document.The tree is interactive. All three popular layouts (rectangular, circular and unrooted) are supported.

article.h3: A brief introduction to programming (in Chinese)
article.p: I wrote it for my girlfriend. She once attended an introductory course on programming, but frustrated by controlling graphic user interface imperatively and the concept of object-oriented programming. So I wrote this article to help her understand the most essential concepts in procedural programming (expression, value, statement, definition, if-statement, for-loop, while-loop, etc.). Also, I want to proof with this introductory text that programming can be fun and easy to learn.
